page.title: 14TRADE IN KINGS LANGLEY
page.content: {SHOPS}_ In the High Street are: 2 general grocers, 2 green grocers, a butcher, a baker, health food shop, 3 dress shops, pet shop, craft shop, florists and haberdashers. {BUSINESSES}_ Intermingled with the shops are the following: a stationer and printer, an upholstery firm, an optician, a chiropodist, 3 banks, 4 estate agents,1 travel agent, 4 hair dressing salons, 2 newsagents, a dentist, 2 chemists, a photographer, a carpet fitter, garage selling petrol, 3 pubs, launderette and a kitchen designer. {INDUSTRY}_ Wanders (Ovaltine) are the largest employers. Light engineering, fencing manufacture, new factory and workshop units on east of canal. Haulage contractors work from large yard west of the canal.
